json.paletteHelp: Converts between a JSON string and its Struct representation, in either direction.
json.help: If the input is a JSON string it tries to parse it to a Struct. If the input is a Struct it creates a JSON string.

strip.paletteHelp: Creates a copy of the $message object only keeping the payload.
strip.help: This node creates a copy of the $message object only keeping the payload.
strip.output1Description: A copy of the input message object only containing payload.

xml.paletteHelp: Converts between a XML string and its Struct representation, in either direction.
xml.help: If the input is a XML string it tries to parse it to a Struct. If the input is a Struct it creates a JSON string.
